profile.title: Profaịlụ onye ọrụ
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Gosi nke mbụ na nke a sụgharịrị
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Gosi nke mbụ na ntụgharị ọnụ
profile.disappearingMessages: Mee ka ozi na-apụ n’onwe ya
profile.noPrivateKey: Enweghị igodo nzuzo na ngwaọrụ a.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tọọ paswọọdụ iji chekwaa ndabere gị:
profile.importSuccess: Ebubata igodo nzuzo nke ọma na ngwaọrụ a.
profile.importFailed: Ebubata adaala (paswọọdụ ezighi ezi ma ọ bụ faịlụ mebiri emebi).
profile.keysRotated: E mepụtara igodo ọhụrụ na e buliri igodo ọha.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Igodo nzuzo gị anaghị apụ na ngwaọrụ a. Zipu oyiri e chebere site na paswọọdụ iji weghachite ya n’ọrụ ọzọ.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ị nọ na ndenye Free— jiri nhọrọ Anyanwụ/Ọnwa dị n'okpuru. Wulite ka ị nweta isiokwu ndị ọzọ.
profile.backupDesc: Mepụta ndabere nke igodo gị nwere paswọọdụ ma weghachite ya na ngwaọrụ ọzọ iji hazie ọnụ.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Mee ka ozi bụrụ n’ihu ọkụ (blur) na ndabara
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Mee ka ozi bụrụ blur mgbe ngwa ahụ apụghị ọrụ
profile.notifyOnCopy: Kwuo m ma ọ bụrụ na e deturu ozi m
profile.followHint: Akụkọ ha ga-apụta n’akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ị na-eso ma ọ bụrụ na ha bipụta maka Ndị na-eso (ma ọ bụ ọha).
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Iziga oku ma ọ bụ ozi gaa n’ihu
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Ziga oku na ozi na-abata na ekwentị gị a kwadoro ma ọ bụ email. Oku/ozi na-apụ nwere ike igosi nọmba Chatforia gị.
profile.aliasBridging: Iziga oku gaa n’ihu (njikọ aha ọzọ)

chat.selectPrompt: Họrọ ozi ma ọ bụ ụlọ mkparịta ụka ka ịmalite ịkparịta ụka
